title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ALLOW THE USE OF PORTIONS OF LUNA STREET IN BARANGAY BAYBAYIN AND PALIS STREET IN BARANGAY TIMUGAN FOR THE PU G-UP/INSTALLATION OF CEDERA FOR THE PERIOD STARTING NOVEMBER 28, 2025/UP TO DECEMBER 9, 2025 IN CELEBRATION OF THE ANNUAL TOWN FIESTA OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS. Author
